description:
Real, unscripted, non-edited, real-time action. The premise is simple: Tie up hot girl, flog hot girl until she screams, "Tickle me!" Tickle girl until she screams, "Flog me!" Do not let up, do not let her catch her breath, and when she can't take it any more make her cum! Rinse and repeat!
Make no mistake -- this is a brutal attack on the senses, and the girl never has a chance. One minute she's in severe pain, the next laughing hysterically out of control; then again in severe pain, then screaming orgasms, then it starts all over with no breaks and no let up, just an overload of hell. (Hell for the girl, heaven for us.)
title: Whip or Tickle 1
